mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_sell (order_sell_pk, fk_seller__order_sell, fk_item_detail__order_sell, order_sell_seller_name, order_sell_method, order_sell_per_price, order_sell_amount, order_sell_date ) VALUES(#{order_sell_pk}, #{fk_seller__order_sell}, (select item_detail_no_PK from item_detail where item_detail_name=#{fk_item_detail__order_sell}), (select seller_name from seller where seller_id_pk=#{order_sell_seller_name}), #{order_sell_method}, #{order_sell_per_price}, #{order_sell_amount}, now());
mapper.select: select max(CAST(substring(order_sell_pk,12) AS DECIMAL)) from order_sell

SELECT order_sell_pk as orderSellPk, fk_seller__order_sell as fkSellerOrderSell, (select item_detail_name from item_detail where item_detail_no_pk = fk_item_detail__order_sell) as fkItemDetailOrderSell, order_sell_method as orderSellMethod, order_sell_per_price as orderSellPerPrice, order_sell_amount as orderSellAmount, order_sell_date as orderSellDate FROM order_sell where fk_seller__order_sell=#{id} LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
